title: Existing slums occupying lands/structures under renewal in dangerous locations such as marshy lands, near water bodies, lands abutting railway tracks/in railway lands, NDZ and sites immediately required for the public and semi-public projects may be relocated at other suitable locations within the planning sectors and may be allowed to be developed in accordance with this Regulation
clause_text: Existing slums occupying lands/structures under renewal in dangerous locations such as marshy lands, near water bodies, lands abutting railway tracks/in railway lands, NDZ and sites immediately required for the public and semi-public projects may be relocated at other suitable locations within the planning sectors and may be allowed to be developed in accordance with this Regulation.
